channel.description: Recent content in Source Code on A Technical Blog

item.title: Methods for Checking Source Code of R Functions
item.description: R function’s source code Recently, I found some problems programming with R, and I habitually pressed F1 for document. However, this document can’t figure out these problems. So I finally decided to check the source code of these functions. To be honest, it’s a little bit struggle for me to find source code since some R functions were written by C. Besides, the object oriented programming such as S3 generics make things weird.
